column1: This is a list of ancient Egyptian sites
column2: throughout all of Egypt and Nubia. Sites are listed by their classical name whenever possible
column3: if not by their modern name
column4: and lastly with their ancient name if no other is available.

column1: A nome is a subnational administrative division of Ancient Egypt.
Nome 1: Land of the arch or To Khentit: the frontier (Ta-Seti)
Nome 13: Upper pomegranate tree (Upper Sycamore and Viper)
Nome 14: Lower pomegranate tree (Lower Sycamore and Viper)
The area from about Faiyum to Asyut is usually referred to as Middle Egypt.
